name: FantasySportsUpdate
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest fantasy sports updates to give you that winning edge in your fantasy league. 

Add the RTSports.com Fantasy Sports Update to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news by going to Settings in the Alexa app.

After adding RTSports.com Fantasy Sports Update, you can say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" or "Alexa, what's in the news?" to hear the last fantasy updates.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
